projects.title: Portfolio with Continuous Deployment
projects.description: Personal portfolio using Gatsby hosted on Netlify. Linked Github repository to support continuous deployment

projects.title: Path Tracker
projects.description: Intended to be used for weightlifting barbell path tracking and technique analysis. On blob creation, Azure Function gets triggered to process an input video file. Object trajectory gets mapped and saved as a gif file in an output blob container.
